summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of 'Remember the Order' memory game. All core gameplay features working correctly including start screen, mode selection, game mechanics, sequence playback, user interaction, game over modal, and FAQ section. Soft neon glass theme implemented beautifully.
passed_tests: Start screen renders with correct title 'Remember the Order'
Mode selector displays all three modes (Classic, Speed, Random) and allows switching
Start Game button transitions properly to game screen
Game screen displays Round 1, restart button, sound toggle, and 2x2 tile grid
All 4 game tiles have correct data-testids (game-tile-0 through game-tile-3)
Sequence playback animation works - tiles light up during 'Watch' phase
Game state indicator changes from 'Watch' to 'Your turn' after sequence
Tiles respond to user clicks during 'Your turn' phase
Game over modal displays with score, stats (rounds, accuracy, best), and score reference labels
Play Again button in game over modal restarts the game
FAQ section visible with 4 accordion items that expand/collapse
Progress dots appear during user turn showing sequence progress
Soft neon glass theme implemented with dark background and glowing tiles
Game flow works correctly: Start → Watch sequence → Your turn → Game over/Next round
success_percentage: Frontend: 95% - All core features working, minor script syntax issues during advanced testing
